property.name: text
property.value: Simple forward-Euler integration to calculate velocity from acceleration.

property.name: text
property.value: Simple forward-Euler integration to calculate position from velocity.

property.name: text
property.value: Simulate N bodies with gravitational forces between them. The initialPositions and initialVelocities parameters provide initial velocities and positions, and the numberOfBodies parameter specifies the number of bodies.

property.name: text
property.value: This model calculates the force on a single body. The inputs are an array with the positions of all the bodies and the position of the single body.

property.name: text
property.value: Sum the forces from each of the bodies. Note that this could be modified to support multiple masses.

property.name: text
property.value: This submodel generates the graphical animation. The MultiInstanceComposite creates a sphere for each body.

property.name: text
property.value: Create a sphere for one body and translate to the specified position.
